name.ja: <ruby>蒼<rt>そう</rt></ruby><ruby>救<rt>きゅう</rt></ruby>の<ruby>光<rt>こう</rt></ruby><ruby>耀<rt>よう</rt></ruby> ガルフレア

requirement.en: Place 1 card from your hand on the bottom of the Deck.

effect.en:
● Shuffle cards from your opponent's Graveyard into the Deck, up to [the number of face-up Celestial Warrior Type monsters on your field] x 2.
● Add 1 Level 4 or lower LIGHT or DARK Attribute monster or 1 "Skysavior Wish" from your Graveyard to your hand.

materials.en: "Ranga the Skysavior Knight" + "Soleil the Skysavior Angel"
